thread.title: Ishqbaaz: Navina Bole's pre-wedding photo-shoot spells pure romance - Bollywoodlife.com
thread.title_full: Ishqbaaz: Navina Bole's pre-wedding photo-shoot spells pure romance - Bollywoodlife.com

author: Manisha Nandrajog
title: Ishqbaaz: Navina Bole's pre-wedding photo-shoot spells pure romance - Bollywoodlife.com
text:
Ishqbaaz: Navina Bole's… Ishqbaaz: Navina Bole’s pre-wedding photo-shoot spells pure romance Navina Bole aka Tia of popular Star Plus show Ishqbaaz, is all set to tie the knot. View pictures from the romantic couple's pre-wedding photo-shoot. By Manisha Nandrajog | Published: February 28, 2017 2:27 pm comments 
Navina Bole aka Tia of popular Star Plus show Ishqbaaz , is all set to tie the knot. The actress recently got engaged to her beau Karan Jeet on January 22, 2017. Navina is prepping up for her D-day and has shared some cute pictures from her pre-wedding shoot on her Instagram account. 
The pictures of Navina and Karan look adorable. No props, no extravagant sets, only the duo sharing cute moments together. Both of them are twinning in the pictures and look madly in love. Their photo-shoot was managed by the famous wedding organiser, Wedding Sutra. And the pictures look AMAZING! 
As their love story goes, Navina and Karan met at a gym two years ago and immediately started dating each other. Now, these lovebirds are all set to tie the knot and the countdown has began. In seven days the adorable couple will take vows to start their new life… Here are the pictures from this romantic couple’s pre-wedding photo-shoot : 
Apart from these pictures, there is also a pre-wedding video in which the duo looks stunning. A post shared by WeddingSutra.com (@weddingsutra) on Feb 24, 2017 at 7:23am PST 
Navina has taken a break from show Ishqbaaz and will be back after her honeymoon. Navina confirmed this news to a leading portal and said, “Yes I am getting married in coming days. But I have not left Ishqbaaz. I am just on break for some time and will come back on the show.” We wish the couple all the best for their wedding. For more updates and gossip stay tuned to BollywoodLife… 
(Image Courtesy: Wedding Sutra)
